plot: A romantic comedy about Johnny, a handsome waiter with a wild imagination. In his attempt to seduce confident, yet cynical Anna he convinces he that he is an immigrant terrorist.
title: Fresh Off the Boat
plot_es: A romantic comedy about Johnny, a handsome waiter with a wild imagination. In his attempt to seduce confident, yet cynical Anna he convinces he that he is an immigrant terrorist.
plot_en: A romantic comedy about Johnny, a handsome waiter with a wild imagination. In his attempt to seduce confident, yet cynical Anna he convinces he that he is an immigrant terrorist.
